item.title: Former Fed, Treasury chiefs urge Supreme Court to block Trump firing Lisa Cook
item.description: President Donald Trump has said he wants to fire Fed Governor Lisa Cook because of allegations she committed mortgage fraud. She denies any wrongdoing...

item.title: Former FBI Director Comey expected to be indicted soon in Virginia federal court: MSNBC
item.description: James Comey reportedly is being investigated for possibly lying to Congress during testimony in 2020 about whether he authorized a leak of information...

item.title: Trump claims ‘sabotage’ at UN from escalator, teleprompter and mic
item.description: Trump noted that The Times, a British newspaper, reported that U.N. employees "joked about turning off an escalator" before his appearance there.

item.title: 1 ICE detainee dead, 2 wounded in Dallas shooting; gunman identified
item.description: DHS Secretary Kristi Noem said authorities do not know the motive for the shooting, but "we know that our ICE law enforcement is facing unprecedented ...

item.title: Trump OMB orders preparation for mass firings of federal workers if government shuts down
item.description: The warning could ratchet up pressure on Congress to strike a deal to avert a government shutdown.
